/usr/bin/g++   -w -fPIC -O0 -g   CMakeFiles/muontomo.e.dir/src/muonTomography.cpp.o  -o muontomo.e -rdynamic /usr/local/root-v6/lib//libCore.so /usr/local/root-v6/lib/libRIO.so /usr/local/root-v6/lib/libGeom.so /usr/local/root-v6/lib/libGraf.so /usr/local/root-v6/lib/libGpad.so /usr/local/root-v6/lib/libHist.so /usr/local/root-v6/lib/libEG.so /usr/local/root-v6/lib/libPhysics.so /usr/local/root-v6/lib/libMathMore.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/root-v6/lib
